  • Play an unlimited number of jigsaw puzzles on your computer.

Gaia PC Jigsaw Puzzle is a jigsaw puzzle game for computer. You can create and play custom jigsaw puzzles with your personal images on your computer (PC). The game allows you to play your favorite jigsaw puzzles the same way you play traditional jigsaw puzzles on a kitchen table. You can play an unlimited number of jigsaw puzzles on your computer and save money. You can also choose your personal images, the number of pieces, custom shapes and more!

Key features

  • Create custom jigsaw puzzles.
  • Play with your personal images.
  • Play with a custom number of puzzle pieces.
  • Play with a great selection of custom shapes of puzzle pieces.
  • Choose the irregularity of the piece edges.
  • Rotate the puzzle pieces.
  • View with zoom in / zoom out.
  • Ghost image.
  • Customize your background environment.
  • Save / Load your games.
  • Easy to play for kids and adults.
  • High quality pieces.
Minimum system requirements
  • OS:  Windows® 10/8/7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or equivalent
  • RAM Memory: 2 GB
  • DirectX®: Version 9.0c
  • Graphic card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible with 3D capabilities
  • Sound: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Hard drive: 200 MB
